mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM STATICS WHERE STARTTIME = (SELECT STARTTIME FROM (SELECT STARTTIME,endtime FROM STATICS WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY STARTTIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AND STARTTIME > SYSDATE -0.25 AND id = #{id} AND endtime IS null
mapper.update: UPDATE STATICS SET ENDTIME = SYSDATE WHERE STARTTIME = (SELECT STARTTIME FROM (SELECT STARTTIME,endtime FROM STATICS WHERE id = #{id} ORDER BY STARTTIME DESC) WHERE ROWNUM = 1) AND STARTTIME > SYSDATE -0.25 AND id = #{id} AND endtime IS null
UPDATE STATICDATA SET staticvalue = (SELECT COUNT(*) cat${cat} FROM statics WHERE page LIKE '%cat=${cat}') WHERE staticname like 'cat${cat}'
mapper.select: select staticname fil FROM staticdata WHERE STATICNUM =${staticnum}
mapper.update: UPDATE staticdata SET STATICVALUE = ( SELECT COUNT (*) FROM statics WHERE filter LIKE '%${fil}%') WHERE STATICNAME LIKE '${fil}'
mapper.select:
SELECT * FROM (SELECT ROWNUM r , a.* FROM (select staticname,staticvalue from staticdata where staticnum = ${staticnum} order by staticvalue desc) a)
stat, spotcategory cat
WHERE ROWNUM < 6
and stat.staticName = cat.cate
SELECT EXP FROM EQCATEGORY WHERE cate LIKE '${staticName}'

SELECT title staticname , COUNT staticvalue FROM (SELECT ROWNUM r , a.num,b.title,a.COUNT FROM (SELECT num,COUNT(*) COUNT FROM FAVORITE WHERE status = 0 GROUP BY num ORDER BY COUNT desc) a , equipments b WHERE a.num =b.NUM) WHERE r < 6

SELECT name staticname , COUNT staticvalue FROM (SELECT ROWNUM r , a.num,b.name,a.COUNT FROM (SELECT num,COUNT(*) COUNT FROM FAVORITE WHERE status = 1 GROUP BY num ORDER BY COUNT desc) a , spot b WHERE a.num =b.NUM) WHERE r < 6
SELECT NAME staticname , READ staticvalue FROM (SELECT ROWNUM r , s.* FROM (SELECT NAME,read FROM spot WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY READ desc) s) WHERE r <6
SELECT page staticname , COUNT staticvalue FROM (SELECT ROWNUM r, a.* FROM (SELECT page,COUNT(*) COUNT FROM statics GROUP BY page ORDER BY COUNT desc) a) WHERE ROWNUM < 6
mapper.update: UPDATE STATICDATA SET STATICVALUE = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACCOUNT WHERE STATUS = 1) WHERE STATICNAME LIKE 'ALL'
UPDATE STATICDATA SET STATICVALUE = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACCOUNT WHERE STATUS = 1 AND gender = 0) WHERE STATICNAME LIKE 'MEN'
UPDATE STATICDATA SET STATICVALUE = (SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ACCOUNT WHERE STATUS = 1 AND gender = 1) WHERE STATICNAME LIKE 'women'
mapper.select: SELECT staticvalue FROM staticdata WHERE STATICNAME LIKE 'ALL'
SELECT staticvalue FROM staticdata WHERE STATICNAME LIKE 'MEN'
SELECT staticvalue FROM staticdata WHERE STATICNAME LIKE 'women'
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM statics WHERE inflow LIKE '%signUpPro%' AND PAGE LIKE '%home%'AND STARTTIME > SYSDATE -7

SELECT title staticname , readcount staticvalue FROM (SELECT ROWNUM r , b.* FROM (SELECT title,READCOUNT FROM BOARD WHERE status = 0 ORDER BY READCOUNT desc) b) WHERE r <6

mapper.update: UPDATE STATICDATA SET STATICVALUE = (SELECT COUNT(TO_CHAR(starttime, 'YYYY-MM-DD')) FROM statics WHERE STARTTIME LIKE SYSDATE AND page LIKE '%writePro%' AND INFLOW LIKE '%writeForm%') WHERE STATICNAME LIKE '0'

select count(*) from account where to_char(reg, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
select count(*) from account where to_char(reg, 'yyyy-MM-dd') = to_char(sysdate-1, 'yyyy-MM-dd')
select * from (select spot.*, rownum r from (select * from spot where status=0 order by score desc) spot) where r<=5
